The judgment of God shewed upon one John [Faustus] doctor in divinity. Tune Fortune my foe
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed for A.M.W.O. and Tho. Thackeray at the Angel in Duck-Lane, [London] : [1695]
Full title, place of publication, and imprint date from Wing. Verse - "All Christian men give ear a while to me,". Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
